title: Souten no Ken Specials
synopsis: Episodes 16, 17, 18 and 21 of the Souten no Ken anime series, which were not originally aired, but released on DVD. Because of this, these episodes are uncut/uncensored.
characters: ['Kasumi, Kenshirou', 'Mang, Kuangyun', 'Zhang, Taiyan', 'de Guise, Charles', 'Pan, Guanglin', 'Pan, Yuling']
staff: [['Egami, Kiyoshi', ['Storyboard']], ['Buronson', ['Original Creator']], ['Hara, Tetsuo', ['Original Character Design']], ['Suda, Masami', ['Animation Director']]]
